title: Debug Application Failures Using System Logs
description: Query journalctl for service errors, analyze logs, identify root cause

steps.instruction: Query system logs from the last hour for errors and critical messages
steps.expected_outcome: Found 23 error messages including database connection failures

steps.instruction: Filter logs specifically for the web-app.service to see detailed errors
steps.expected_outcome: Service logs show repeated connection timeout to Redis at localhost:6379

steps.instruction: Monitor web-app logs in real-time for ERROR patterns
steps.expected_outcome: 7 errors in last 100 lines, all Redis connection related

steps.instruction: Write diagnostic message to syslog marking investigation start

parameters.message: Investigation started: Redis connection failures in web-app

steps.expected_outcome: Message logged to syslog with tag web-app-debug

success_criteria: Root cause identified: Redis service down, investigation logged
cleanup: systemctl restart redis && systemctl restart web-app
